title: 15 Things You Didn’t Know About The Cigar Authority
itunes:title: 15 Things You Didn’t Know About The Cigar Authority
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority broadcasting live from the Toscano Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire... 15 things or more - you didn’t know (and some didn’t need to know) about The Cigar Authority and its hosts! What will surprise you, what won't surprise you... Tune in to hear things about the hosts that will shock you!!

We will fire up a cigar from The Cigar Authority care package in the first hour; All Saints St Francis Habano. In the second hour we will fire up a Las Calaveras from Crowned Heads...

Join us for all of this and the usual suspects including the VS Question of the Week, Offer of the Day, Ask the Don, the Email of the Week and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH.
